description: Replaces voxel values by their rank in the set of values collected over all voxels in all input datasets.

input_datasets.title: Input datasets
input_datasets.description: Input datasets. Acceptable data types are: byte, short, and floats.

output_prefix.title: Output prefix
output_prefix.description: Output prefix. If you have multiple datasets on input, the prefix is preceded by r00., r01., etc. If no prefix is given, the default is rank.DATASET1, rank.DATASET2, etc.
